name: KEM--2018 The 3rd International Conference on Advanced Functional Materials (ICAFM 2018)--EI, SCOPUS
content: ICAFM 2018 Full Papers accepted and registered will be published into KEM conference proceedings, to be indexed by EI, SCOPUS, etc. →Keynote&Plenary Speakers: Prof. Lu, Zheng-Hong University of Toronto, Canada; Prof. David Ginley, Materials and Chemistry Science and Technology, NREL, USA; Prof. GONG Hao, Dept Mat. Sci & Eng, National University of Singapore; Prof. Ju Chou, Florida Gulf Coast University, USA →Contact: Conference Secretary: Celine XI Email: icafm@sciei.org Tel.: +86 18207777775
